metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24027 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Live Networks, Inc., liblivemedia version 20200625, there is a potential buffer overflow bug in the server handling of a RTSP "PLAY" command, when the command specifies seeking by absolute time.

criterions.comment: liblivemedia: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
